name: Game Ready High Resolution Kitsune - Easy Animation
name_original: Game Ready High Resolution Kitsune - Easy Animation
description:
Kitsune Pack is an Extended Use License

Technical details:

  • Faces 60007, tris 84663, verts 62323
  • Rigged with Epic Skeleton. Hair, ears, eyes, breast, tail, cloth, ribbons are rigged too.
  • Easy Animations retarget in Unity and Unreal Engine. Epic Skeleton/Humanoid rig.
  • Facial expressions are included (Morph Targets, Blendshapes).
  • Apple blendshapes for live link face
  • You can use this model for face mocap (live stream) and conversation animations.
  • PBR Textures Metall/Roughness
  • 4K Textures - normal, metallic, roughness, albedo, opacity, matID
  • 7 Texture sets - Body, Head, Clothes, Socks, Teeth, Hair, Eyes
  • Easy Color change of any part via Material Instances. MatID is included. (UE4)

4 Different Hairstyles:

  1. Loose
  2. Loose with Bangs
  3. Buns
  4. Buns with Bangs

Other Details:

  • The model is completely modular, you can remove or add any part you want.
  • The body under the clothes is included, it's not a cutout!
  • Physics is enabled: for clothes via Cloth Simulation; for ribbons, tail, ears via PhysAsset. (UE4)
  • The model is completely modular, you can remove or add any part you want.
  • Body texture contains 2 versions: nude and censored.

Archive includes:

  • fbx.
  • all textures (png. and tga. mix)
  • renders in high resolution
  • Maya scene (2019)
  • Unity project (v2018.4.27+) < coming soon
  • UE4 project (v4.19+) (rigged with Epic Skeleton!)
  • You can ask for other file formats if you need!

If you have any questions feel free to write me here or on my e-mail 0xmirach@gmail.com

Thank you for your support!

Release Notes:

Added Unity project (v2018.4.27+)
